requirements.title: Profile Management
requirements.description: Users should be able to manage their profile information, including updating personal details.

acceptance_criteria.then: Users should be able to manage their profile information, including updating personal details.

requirements.original_intent: Users can manage their profile information.

requirements.title: View Profile Information
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: View their profile information

System Behavior: The system displays the user's current profile information.

Expected Outcome: Users can see their profile details.

Observable Result: The profile information is displayed correctly on the user interface.

acceptance_criteria.when: The user navigates to the profile section
acceptance_criteria.then: The system displays the user's profile information

gaps: Specific fields of profile information to be managed are not defined.
risks: [ambiguity] The lack of clarity on what constitutes 'profile information' may lead to incomplete implementation. (Severity: medium)
ambiguities: Specific fields of profile information to be managed are not defined.
requirements.original_intent: Users can manage their profile information.

requirements.title: Update Profile Information
requirements.description:
Actor: User

Action: Update their profile information

System Behavior: The system allows users to modify their profile details and save changes.

Expected Outcome: Users can successfully update their profile.

Observable Result: The updated profile information is reflected in the system.

acceptance_criteria.given: The user is logged in and viewing their profile information
acceptance_criteria.when: The user makes changes and submits the update
acceptance_criteria.then: The system saves the changes and displays the updated profile information

gaps: The specific fields that can be updated are not defined.
risks: [ambiguity] Without clear definitions of editable fields, users may be confused about what can be changed. (Severity: medium)
ambiguities: The specific fields that can be updated are not defined.
